===Floor 5===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
** When your character's HP is greater than 50%, ATK and DEF are increased by 25%.
** When HP is greater than 80%, Normal Attack SPD is increased by 20%.
** When HP is greater than 80%, Movement SPD is increased by 20%.
** When HP is greater than 95%, CRIT Rate is increased by 10% and CRIT DMG is increased by 20%.
*'''Additional Effects'''
**In Chamber 1's First Half, one of the Large Cryo Slimes is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.
**In Chamber 1's Second Half, one of the Pyro Abyss Mages is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Pyro|Smouldering Flames}}.
**In Chamber 2's First half, there is a {{Cryo}} [[Elemental Nodes|Elemental Node]] that periodically applies a massive resistance and defense buff to enemy units until the status has been removed with {{Pyro}} attacks.
**In Chamber 2's Second half, there is a {{Pyro}} [[Elemental Nodes|Elemental Node]] that applies a massive resistance and attack buff to enemy units until the status has been removed with {{Hydro}} attacks.
**In Chamber 3's First Half, the Fatui Electro Cicin Mage is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Electro|Engulfing Storm}}.
**In Chamber 3's Second half, the Fatui Pyro Agent is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which periodically fires a Pursuing Fireball.

*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
** When HP is less than 60%, ATK is increased by 50% and DEF is increased by 50%.
** When HP is less than 45%, Normal Attack SPD is increased by 30%.
** When HP is less than 45%, Movement SPD is increased by 30%.
** When HP is less than 30%, CRIT Rate is increased by 20% and CRIT DMG is increased by 40%.
